## Accessibility Statement

The ECON1550 International Finance course website is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for all users, including those with disabilities.

### Standards

We aim to conform to [WCAG 2.1 Level AA](https://www.w3.org/WAI/WCAG21/quickref/) standards.

### Features

This site includes the following accessibility features:

- Semantic HTML structure with proper heading hierarchy
- Keyboard navigation support with skip-to-content link
- Responsive design for various devices and screen sizes
- Sufficient color contrast
- Descriptive link text
